title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Police Simulation Training: Enhancing Creative Crisis Response Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic police procedural knowledge and crisis response experience
context.additional_context: Blended education program implementing an online police simulation training environment and conducting feedback sessions offline. Learners participate in simulations using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can manage cognitive load in crisis situations and apply creative problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy.
After repeating the same simulation scenario twice, learners can generate three or more creative response strategies.
Learners can achieve a 90% success rate in resolving conflicts with emotionally agitated citizens using nonviolent communication skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
